title: Climate Justice and Food Security
speaker_position_2: United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights, 1997 - 2002
abstract: President Robinson gives an impassioned talk on the future of food justice and climate change. She links gender justice with those issues and challenges the US to join the rest of the world in finding solutions.
academic_disciplines: Public Affairs, Public Policy and Public Administration
lcsh_topic: Food insecurity; Agriculture; Population; Climatic changes
admin_notes: Additional affiliation: President, Mary Robinson Foundation for Climate Justice. Further reading: http://opac.amphilsoc.org/cgi-bin/koha/opac-detail.pl?biblionumber=239670
